PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-01462019-02-28,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
SubjectHon. Sheilah L. Martin ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder authorizing additional reimbursement periods for the Hon. SHEILAH L. MARTIN, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada (1) for the interest accrued during the period beginning on September 30, 2018 and ending on June 29, 2019 on the short term demand loan contracted for the purchase of her new residence and any legal fees related to that loan; and (2) for the difference between the sale price of her former residence and its fair market value for the period beginning on October 5, 2018 and ending on July 4, 2019.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
Attachments
